BusyCursor¶

class pyqtgraph.BusyCursor¶

Class for displaying a busy mouse cursor during long operations. Usage:

with pyqtgraph.BusyCursor():
    doLongOperation()

May be nested.

__init__()¶

x.__init__(...) initializes x; see help(type(x)) for signature
